agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Corrections TIME & DATE: upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, April 23, 2019 PLACE: 3W.15 CHAIR: Rep. James White The committee will meet to consider pending business. HR 969 Anchia Commemorating the 10th anniversary of the Tim Cole Act, paying tribute to the lives of Timothy Cole, James Lee Woodard, Johnnie Lindsey, Billy James Smith, and Ronald Gene Taylor, and recognizing the Innocence Project of Texas.
